how_to: Pray with beads: Creed, then on large beads Our Father, small beads Hail Mary. After each decade say Glory Be and Fatima Prayer. Conclude with Hail Holy Queen. Meditate on one set of mysteries (Joyful, Sorrowful, Glorious, Luminous).

prayers.title: Fatima Prayer
prayers.text: O my Jesus, forgive us our sins, save us from the fire of hell, lead all souls to heaven, especially those who have most need of your mercy.

prayers.title: Hail Holy Queen
prayers.text: Hail, holy Queen, Mother of mercy. To you we cry, poor banished children of Eve. Turn then, most gracious advocate, your eyes of mercy toward us; and after this our exile show unto us the blessed fruit of your womb, Jesus. O clement, O loving, O sweet Virgin Mary. Pray for us, O holy Mother of God, that we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ. Amen.

joyful.title: The Annunciation
joyful.meditation: The Angel Gabriel announces to Mary that she will bear the Son of God.

joyful.title: The Presentation
joyful.meditation: Jesus is presented in the Temple.

joyful.title: The Finding in the Temple
joyful.meditation: Jesus is found in the Temple after three days.

sorrowful.title: The Scourging
sorrowful.meditation: Jesus is scourged at the pillar.

luminous.title: The Baptism of Jesus
luminous.meditation: Jesus is baptized in the Jordan.
